pages.text: $(li)Activator Rails are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/rail)Rail$(/l).$(br)$(li)This kind of Rail works as the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/redstone)Redstone Dust$(/l), it can transport input redstone signals, but only with others Activator Rails.

$(li)They can active the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt_minecart)Minecart with TNT$(/l).$(br)$(li)Any Minecart that is on top of an Activator Rail will start shaking, kicking you out of the Minecart if you are mount on it.
